content:
There has been some speculation about Damian Lillard potentially leaving the Trail Blazers, which has caused concern among some fans. Lillard has been a key player for the team for several seasons and is widely regarded as one of the best point guards in the league.

While some fans are worried about the prospect of losing Lillard, many are optimistic that he will continue to stay with the team and help lead them to success. Lillard has expressed his loyalty to the Trail Blazers in the past, and the team has shown a willingness to build around him and provide him with the support he needs to succeed.

That being said, if Lillard were to leave the team, it would undoubtedly have a significant impact on the Trail Blazers' success. Lillard is a dynamic player who can score from anywhere on the court and has been a key factor in the team's success in recent years. However, some fans believe that the team has enough talent and depth to be successful even without Lillard, although it remains to be seen how realistic this is.
